query: SELECT trg.id, trg.titulo, trg.estado, trg.reuniao_id, trg.resultado_discussao, u.name as gestor_nome FROM topicos_reuniao_gestores trg LEFT JOIN gestores g ON trg.gestor_id = g.id LEFT JOIN users u ON g.user_id = u.id ORDER BY trg.reuniao_id DESC LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT trg.id, trg.titulo, trg.estado, trg.reuniao_id, trg.resultado_discussao, u.name as gestor_nome FROM topicos_reuniao_gestores trg LEFT JOIN gestores g ON trg.gestor_id = g.id LEFT JOIN users u ON g.user_id = u.id ORDER BY trg.reuniao_id DESC LIMIT 20;
